mapper.insert: insert into users(userid, passwd, uname, gender, address, postcode, detailaddress, extraaddress, phone, email) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{uname}, #{gender}, #{address},#{postcode},#{detailaddress},#{extraaddress}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where userid = #{id}
select uname from users where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
select userid from users where uname = #{uname} and email = #{email}
select passwd from users where userid = #{userid} and uname = #{uname}
select count(*) from users where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{userpasswd}
